text: Tai chi chuan (; ), also known as "Supreme Ultimate Fist", is an internal Chinese martial art which is practiced for both its defense training and health benefits. ==Related pages== *Kung-fu *Taoism ==Books== * * * * * * ==Other websites== * * * * * Some on-line exercises ;Videos of the major styles * * *Chen Shitong's Chen style at Google Video *Sun Jianyun's Sun style at Google Video *Hao Shaoru's Wu/Hao style at Google Video * * Category:Chinese martial arts Category:Meditation
title: Tai chi chuan
